non-zero values in matrix

avg: 4324164 (1.203412ms)

max: 6173423 (1.718059ms)
avg: 4115384 (1.145308ms)

Difference (i.e. how much longer did the branching take):
min: 263628 (0.0733678ms)
max: -344252 (-0.095805ms) // max time was longer in no branching version
avg: 208780 (0.058104ms)
